verses.content: Naupanghai, Lalpaa chun in nu le pahai thu zâwm ro, chu chu thil indik a ni sih a.
“I nu le pa chawimawi rawh,” (Chu chu thupêk tiem nei hmasa tak a nih).
“Chuongchun, i ta dingin ṭhâng a ta, hnuoiah dam sâwt i tih.”
Chun, nangni pahai, in nauhai suklungsen naw unla, Lalpa thunun- na le kâwknaa chun enkawl lem ro.
Suokhai, Krista thu zâwm angin, ṭidêk le inthina, lungril sakhat putin, hnuoia in hotuhai thu zâwm ro.
Mihriem suklâwmtuhai ang ela mit rawng bâwl loin, Krista suok anga lungrila Pathien ditzâwng thaw lemin,
mihriem rawng bâwl ang el ni loin, Lalpa rawngbâwl ang lema inhâwktaka bâwlin;
suok ni sienla, suok ni naw sienla khawm, mi tinin thil ṭha an thaw senghai chu Lalpa kuoma inthawkin a ngai bawk hmu nâwk an tih ti hre zing ro.
Chun, nangni hotuhai, chuong ang bawkin, anni le nangni hotu chu vânah a um ti le, ama chun mi ditsak bîk a nei nawh ti hrein, vau loin an chungah thaw ve ro.
A tâwp taka chun Lalpaa le a hrâtna thahruia chun thilthawtheina neiin um ro.
Diebol zâwrnahai chu in do zona dingin Pathien râlthuom famkimin inthuom ro.
Ei ibuonhai hi tisa le thisen an ni si nawh a; inlalnahai le thuneina- hai le, hi inthim chunga khawvêl rorêltuhai le, vân hmunhaia thlarau suol umhai chu an ni lem.
Chuleiin, ni ṭha nawa chun in do zona ding le, in thaw zo hnung khawma in ngîr theina dingin Pathien râlthuom famkim chu la ro.
Chuongchun, in kâwng chu thutaka hrênin, felna âwmphaw chu hâkin,
remna Chanchin Ṭha inbuot- saina chu in kea bunin ngîr ro.
Chu naw khawm chu ringna phaw la unla, chu chun mi suol thal chawk thei po po chu sukmit thei in tih.
Chun, sandamna lukhum le Thlarau ngûnhnâm (Pathien Thu chu) la unla, ṭawngṭaina le hnina tinrêngin,
ieng huna khawm Thlaraua ṭawngṭaiin, chu kawnga chun mi inthieng po pohai ta dingin ṭhahnem- ngai tak le hni tlatin ngaiven ro:
Chanchin Ṭha thurûk huoitaka puong dinga ka bau ka ka a, thu inhriltira ka um theina dingin ka ta ding khawmin mi hnipêk ro:
chu kawnga chun ka thu hril ding ang chu huoitaka ka hril theina dingin. Chu Chanchin Ṭha palai khaidiet bun ka nih.
Chun, nangni khawmin iengtin am ka um a, ka chanchin in hriet theina dingin, Tukik, Lalpaa unau dittak le ringumtak hin iengkim inhriettir a ti cheu:
hi lei tak hin ama chu in kuomah ka hung tir a nih, kan chan- chin in hriet theina ding le ama hin in lungril a sukthlamuong theina dingin.
Pa Pathien le Lalpa Isu Krista kuoma inthawka inremna le ringna ṭhang hmangaina unauhai kuoma khan um raw se.
Ei Lalpa Isu Krista chuoiloa hmangaituhai po po kuomah lunginsietna um raw se.
